CustomField.description: When ItemType = Item, controls revenue reporting and some aspects of price calculation, as well as where the item appears on a BEO. When ItemType = Simple Menu, indicates where the item should appear on the BEO. Not used when ItemType = Detailed Menu or Text.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When ItemType = Item, controls revenue reporting and some aspects of price calculation, as well as where the item appears on a BEO. When ItemType = Simple Menu, indicates where the item should appear on the BEO. Not used when ItemType = Detailed Menu or Text.
CustomField.label: Revenue Classification
